sources.title: Boys' Reformatory
sources.description: A tough street kid (Frankie Darro) takes the rap for a burglary committed by the son (Frank Coghlan Jr.) of his foster family and is sent to a boys reformatory, where the inmates are under the thumb of corrupt guards and a brutal prison doctor (Grant Withers).

sources.title: Boys' Reformatory (1939) PRISON DRAMA
sources.description:
Stars: Frankie Darro, Grant Withers, Lillian Elliott 
Director: Howard Bretherton

A tough street kid takes the rap for a burglary committed by the son of his foster family. He is sent to a reformatory, where the inmates are under the thumb of corrupt guards and a brutal prison doctor.

sources.title: Boys' Reformatory (1939) Action, Adventure, Crime
sources.description:
A tough street kid takes the rap for a burglary committed by the son of his foster family and is sent to a boys reformatory, where the inmates are under the thumb of corrupt guards and a brutal prison doctor.
